playn.core

Interface Layer.HasSize

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Layer
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GroupLayer.Clipped, ImageLayer, ImmediateLayer.Clipped, SurfaceLayer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroupLayerCanvas.Clipped, GroupLayerGL.Clipped, ImageLayerCanvas, ImageLayerGL, ImmediateLayerCanvas.Clipped, ImmediateLayerGL.Clipped, SurfaceLayerCanvas, SurfaceLayerGL
    Enclosing interface:
    Layer

    public static interface Layer.HasSize
extends Layer
    Interface for Layers containing explicit sizes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface playn.core.Layer

        Layer.HasSize, Layer.HitTester, Layer.Util

      Returns the width of the layer.
